iban_desc: By providing your IBAN and confirming this payment, you are authorizing REGIONALE-ERNTE. and Stripe, our payment service provider, to send instructions to your bank to debit your account and your bank to debit your account in accordance with those instructions. You are entitled to a refund from your bank under the terms and conditions of your agreement with your bank. A refund must be claimed within 8 weeks starting from the date on which your account was debited.
cod_desc: Payment method COD(Cash on Delivery) is going to be available after your first order is successfully processed.

german_status_desc: Food supply chain is very ineffective, Massproduction, massive Foodwaste of Supermarkets and increasing scarcety of resources, high CO2 emission due to long transportation ways
regionale_advantage: with Regionaleernte a huge step against those challenges is made...
advantage2_desc1: Food remains fresh due to short transportation ways
advantage2_desc2: Food can be bought according to season
